name: RentLinx
overview:
RentLinx provides multi-list advertising services for Realtors, owners and managers of apartments and rental homes.

List once at www.rentlinx.com, and RentLinx places your ad on multiple websites in The RentLinx Network. All listings include unlimited photos, descriptions and attachments. You have 24 x 7 access to their listings, as well as lead and traffic tracking.

RentLinx Basic includes ads on multiple websites and a Craigslist Helper template tool - all for free.

Upgrade to RentLinx Plus! and get your ads placed on many premium (paid) websites. You pay only $10 for each new renter who contacts you. If your ad doesn’t generate a new renter contact, it’s free! All leads are reviewed to ensure that you are never charged for duplicates, wrong numbers, solicitors or calls from current residents. You get high-quality leads and guaranteed results!
